pyCoalesce.utilities package¶

@author: Scott Orr

This sub-package provides a handful of objects that don’t correspond to the Coalesce Java classes or the Coalesce RESTful API operations, but which are necessary to make pyCoalesce work.

The importable objects in this sub-package are:

  • pyCoalesce.utilities.URL_class.URL
  • pyCoalesce.utilities.API_request.get_response
  • pyCoalesce.utilities.logging.package_logger

Submodules¶

  • pyCoalesce.utilities.API_request module
  • pyCoalesce.utilities.logger module
  • pyCoalesce.classes.URL_class module
